text: 1point 2 The hormones secreted from the ovarian follicle are (choose all the options that are correct) (J Follicle stimulating hormone (FSH) () Luteinizing hormone (LH) [J Oestrogen () Progesterone (J nhibin () oxytocin (J Prolactin The functions of luteinizing hormone (LH) include (choose all the options that are correct) () inhibition of FSH release (J ovulation () stimulation of inhibin secretion () formation of the corpus luteum
